remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一套`static`可以用于呈现按钮控件的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a button control. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 若要绘制一个按钮，使用之一方法。To draw a button, use one of the methods. 这些方法提供了各种选项，如绘制文本或图像的按钮。These methods provide a variety of options, such as drawing text or an image on the button. 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的按钮。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, will draw the button with the current visual style. 否则为将绘制具有经典 Windows 样式的按钮。Otherwise, will draw the button with the classic Windows style. 这很有用，如果您正在绘制的操作系统中的当前视觉样式设置应自动匹配的自定义控件。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should automatically match the current visual style setting of the operating system. 此类包装的功能设置为其中一个元素由公开类。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用的自定义控件方法，以便绘制一个按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the method to draw a button. 当单击该按钮控件绘制原始按钮，边界内的一个较小的按钮，该控件使用方法来绘制原始按钮的剩余部分。When the button is clicked, the control draws a smaller button inside the bounds of the original button, and the control uses the method to paint over the rest of the original button.
